item.title: About
item.description: Welcome! I’m Morok! And I’m currently developing Tactical RPG, WOTN (World of The Numbers). It’s not final title becouse it’s pretty lame. The game is based on 3 main ideas: Battle, Leveling, Realistic Hardcore Battle Battle is turn-based. Inspiration: Fire Emblem, Final Fantasy Tactics Leveling No predefined classes. Combine any Skills and Attributes. Inspiration: Dark Souls Realistic Hardcore Combination of realism (wounds slows you down, etc.) and hardcore (you can’t carry items if you haven’t a bag).
